channel.title: Preseli Hills on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Preseli Hills on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Pembrokeshire snow in January 2010
item.description: Had a big snowstorm last night that covered Pembrokeshire with a bit of snow. These photos taken from a hike up to the highest peak in the Preseli hills - Foel Cwmcerwyn . Very windy at the top!
